segments.text: I'm just fixated on the woman at the sink.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's standing there, diligently polishing a plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her focus is absolute, almost meditative.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But this intense concentration is causing her to miss everything around her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The sink is gushing water onto the floor, creating a literal flood in her kitchen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her foot is in the puddle, yet she shows absolutely no sign of noticing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's infuriating to watch such a blatant oversight.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: How can someone be so completely unaware of their immediate surroundings?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The children are practically performing an acrobatics act behind her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I really wish I could call out to her, make her look down.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This level of detachment is simply astonishing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She needs to snap out of it before something truly bad happens.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I'm getting quite agitated watching this unfold.
segments.speaker: PAR
